item.title: Bug report
item.author: invalid@example.com (CyMek)
item.dc:creator: CyMek
item.content:encoded:
From today I have a bug report to submit.

-The minimap size is too small, and in one game of 4 the indicator graphics were out of place:


-The shock turrets on the fighters drew to the wrong location, (Possibly 0,0,0?) though they did damage as usual.
[SCREENSHOT]http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/4547/usbug29ba.jpg[/SCREENSHOT]

-The bridges were not solid, and my units fell to the bottom of the river.

-After a...

Bug report

item.title: Mapping info for Uskaarj2k4
item.author: invalid@example.com (Silver_Ibex)
item.dc:creator: Silver_Ibex
item.content:encoded:
To edit maps for Uskaarj you will need to add some new stuff to the UT2004.ini file so it knows where the new Uskaarj folders are located.
In the UT2004.ini file find the “[Core.System]” area that lists “Paths=” and below the last one, add in the following.

Paths=../USkaarj/System/*.u
Paths=../USkaarj/Maps/*.ut2
Paths=../USkaarj/Textures/*.utx
Paths=../USkaarj/Sounds/*.uax
Paths=../USkaarj/Music/*.umx
Paths=../USkaarj/StaticMeshes/*.usx
Paths=../USkaarj/Animations/*.ukx...

Mapping info for Uskaarj2k4

item.title: Hello everyone New to USkaarj.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Jackal)
item.dc:creator: Jackal
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I am newbie 2 Unreal. I am lost. Please help me. I want 2 learned 2 map 4 USkaarj, but don't no where 2 start at lol Plz help thx

Findings in 15min game, will report more:

* Can we get a wider zoom? Maybe a bit more in both in and out zoom. Also noticed that when I use the WASD keys to move, my screen would (I guess) zoom out really quickly, then when I stoped, it zoomed back in. Kinda freaked me out. Not to bad, but it kind of annoys me :/

* Under...

Hello everyone New to USkaarj.

item.title: Uskaarj 2k4 battle report
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Well I just finished playing a of uskaarj using the new build and uskaarj is now stable and does not crash my system YAY. Also the units auto attack now so base turrets really work like they should and now kick ass. Also units auto attack now works so they can now handle a fight with out getting totally killed when you are not looking.

I managed to keep the upper right hand corner of the map until swag slipped in some wasps and took out my HQ ending the game score one for Swag....

Uskaarj 2k4 battle report

item.title: Mapping for Uskaarj2k4
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Mapping for Uskaarj2k4

When placing the terrain to start with use these settings, Terrain texture should be 128X128 and terrainscale of 176x176x176 or 256x256x256 will work
Fog of war is easy to place open the Uskaarj.u file then open the actor browser and look under Info/Terrain-info there should be a class called USFogOfwar.
Place this actor on your map, there are are some things that must be done before the fog will show up. first open its props and go to "terraininfo" then...

Mapping for Uskaarj2k4

item.title: Some errors
item.author: invalid@example.com (NetsRot)
item.dc:creator: NetsRot
item.content:encoded:
When i tried to explore the enemy base the second time, the building was invisible but units was coming out of it.
5min later i got Segmentation fault and it messed up my desktop so i had to restart X.

I was able to view particles from the other side of the map. So i knew where the enemy base was located without scouting.

The units didn't attack back when fired on.
No auto attack is included in this version?

The other player said that my turrets rockets wasn't rendered, but i did...

Some errors
